forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West wind 12 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon reveals an inviting clarity, with mostly sunny skies and gentle breezes from the west. A high near 64 degrees offers a comfortable warmth, though you may soon find the temperatures tapering to around 62 as the day unwinds. While the gusty winds at 21 mph, with occasional bursts touching 26 mph, add a brisk touch to the ambiance, clouds will begin to mingle with the evening light, casting a pleasant, partly cloudy veil over the city as night descends, bringing a low around 56 degrees.

The day holds an air of quiet enjoyment; the absence of fog transforms the bay into a sparkling vista, encouraging leisurely strolls along the waterfront or inside cozy cafés, where one can savor a warm beverage while watching the world pass by. Given the temperatures and winds, consider donning a light sweater or a comfortable jacket, especially as the evening settles in. This delicate mix of warmth and coolness invites exploration, perhaps a visit to the local bookstore or an evening of casual dining in one of the many hidden gems found throughout the bustling streets. Amid the dwindling daylight, the city’s charm beckons you outdoors to relish its vibrancy, offering a sensible yet delightful end to the day.
